Package edu.missouristate.taschedulegenerator.util

Class AutoCompleteComboBoxListener<T>

java.lang.Object
edu.missouristate.taschedulegenerator.util.AutoCompleteComboBoxListener<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the combobox the auto-complete functionality is being added to.
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
public class AutoCompleteComboBoxListener<T>
extends Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
Adds auto-complete functionality to a ComboBox.
